project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Users can see sent, delivered, and read status indicators
Messages appear in correct chronological order across all devices
non_functional: System must support at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Video calls connect within 3 seconds under normal network conditions
Video and audio remain synchronized with less than 200ms latency
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during calls
Support for at least 4 participants in a group call
dependencies: Media server or peer-to-peer WebRTC setup
non_functional: Video quality adjusts dynamically based on network bandwidth
Secure transmission of audio/video streams using encryption

notes: Assumed requirement includes both one-to-one and group messaging and calling; no explicit mention of platforms (web, mobile) so cross-platform support is assumed.
